mapper.select: SELECT s.sch_no, c.cns_no, c.cns_nm, c.ofc_no, (SELECT stud_nm FROM student st WHERE st.stud_no = a.stud_no) AS stud_nm, aply_no, GET_CD_NM('CS', dscsn_stat) AS sch_state, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, sch_ymd, sch_hr FROM cschedule s JOIN counselor c ON s.cns_no = c.cns_no LEFT JOIN caply a ON s.sch_no = a.sch_no

SELECT s.sch_no, c.cns_no, c.cns_nm, c.ofc_no, (SELECT stud_nm FROM student st WHERE st.stud_no = a.stud_no) AS stud_nm, aply_no, GET_CD_NM('CS', dscsn_stat) AS sch_state, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, sch_ymd, sch_hr FROM cschedule s JOIN counselor c ON s.cns_no = c.cns_no LEFT JOIN caply a ON s.sch_no = a.sch_no WHERE c.cns_no = #{cns_no}
SELECT uno, cns_no, cns_nm, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, ofc_no, uemail FROM counselor JOIN user ON uno = user_no WHERE left(cns_field, 2) = 'P1' ORDER BY cns_field, cns_no
SELECT cns_no, cns_nm, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, ofc_no, uemail FROM counselor JOIN user ON uno = user_no WHERE uno=#{user_no} AND left(cns_field, 2) = 'P1'
SELECT code, ccnm FROM commoncode WHERE `div` = 'CO0010'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cschedule (cns_no, sch_ymd, sch_hr) VALUES (#{cns_no}, #{sch_ymd}, #{sch_hr})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cschedule WHERE sch_no=#{sch_no} AND (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM caply WHERE sch_no=#{sch_no}) = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO caply (stud_no, sch_no, dscsn_ymd, dscsn_hr) VALUES (#{stud_no}, #{sch_no}, (SELECT sch_ymd FROM cschedule WHERE sch_no=#{sch_no}), (SELECT sch_hr FROM cschedule WHERE sch_no=#{sch_no}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cschedule WHERE sch_no IN ( SELECT s.sch_no FROM cschedule s LEFT JOIN caply a ON s.sch_no = a.sch_no WHERE a.aply_no IS NULL AND ((STR_TO_DATE(sch_ymd, '%Y%m%d') = CURDATE() AND sch_hr <= #{hourNow}) OR (STR_TO_DATE(sch_ymd, '%Y%m%d') < CURDATE())) )
mapper.update: UPDATE caply SET dscsn_stat = 'CS005' WHERE dscsn_stat = 'CS001' AND ((STR_TO_DATE(dscsn_ymd, '%Y%m%d') = CURDATE() AND dscsn_hr <= #{hour}) OR (STR_TO_DATE(dscsn_ymd, '%Y%m%d') < CURDATE()))
UPDATE caply SET dscsn_stat = 'CS004' WHERE dscsn_stat = 'CS002' AND ((STR_TO_DATE(dscsn_ymd, '%Y%m%d') = CURDATE() AND dscsn_hr < #{hour}) OR (STR_TO_DATE(dscsn_ymd, '%Y%m%d') < CURDATE()))
mapper.select: SELECT aply_no, GET_CNS_NM(cns_no) AS cns_nm, cns_no, GET_STUD_NM(stud_no) AS stud_nm, stud_no, dscsn_ymd, dscsn_hr, dscsn_stat, sch_no FROM csche_ply WHERE aply_no IS NOT NULL

SELECT aply_no, aply_no_old, GET_CNS_NM(cns_no) AS cns_nm, cns_no, GET_STUD_NM(stud_no) AS stud_nm, stud_no, dscsn_ymd, dscsn_hr, dscsn_stat, sch_no FROM csche_ply WHERE aply_no IS NOT NULL AND cns_no = #{cns_no}
